text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……J-just now, that announcement. That means the 『Scavenger Hunt, 
4000m Obstacle Course』 has already started……？

text_block_list.name: Referee
text_block_list.text:
Alright, we're starting the Quiz round now！ Everyone that's 
participating, please get to your positions！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Everyone, let's get ready to start the cheer！ Match up with the 
Cheer Squad and make sure you raise your voices！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
W-wait a second, Captain！ 
Are you fine with this！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong？ The event has already started. What we need to do 
right now, is cheer on those right infront――

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
But King-san, haven't you been wanting to go cheer on 
Kawakami-san this whole time！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: H-how did you know that……？

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
……w-we could tell！ Because, we've been 
watching you the whole time……！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
At first I…… I thought you were kind of overbearing. But you kept 
reaching out to us, and consoling us. We finally realized.

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
On Pearl-san's uniform there was an 『S』 and 『P』…… 
Nature-san's uniform had an 『N』 and 『N』……

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
These clothes we received from you, Captain, all had 
our initials on them. From the very beginning, not 
just the Uma Musume that would be cheering――

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
You also worked to help us out too, and you 
were always trying to move us forward……！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
T-that's why this time, it's our turn to be members 
that you can be proud of！ So please, go cheer on 
the person you wanted to the most！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …………dummy.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Isn't your voice quavering？ With a voice like that, wouldn't it 
just make everyone worry about you instead？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Listen, even with that, I'm a first-rate Captain. With the 
current situation, leaving you here would be irresponsible.

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text: But……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
In that case, how about if another first-rate 
Captain could step in for ya！？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
The Disciplinary Committee has come to return this banner that 
someone left behind！！ And while we're at it, the former Cheer 
Squad Captain, Bamboo Memory, has arrived！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Eh, Bamboo-san……？ 
Why are you here……？ And with that clothing――

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: It's last year's uniform！ And besides――

text_block_list.name: Pearl on the Phone
text_block_list.text:
『Hey！ Bamboo, have you made it to the gym！？ Please. Let King 
know！ That you'll take care of the cheering there！』

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
If someone's asking for help, then it's 
only natural to respond to that！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Uooooooooh！ I couldn't just stand there and do nothing！ It's fine 
if I join in with the cheering, rightー！？

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text:
Waah, isn't that last year's Captain！？ 
Her voice is so loud～！ What a nice surprise, it looks funー！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
……Captain, please！ 
Get going！

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text:
Oh, the Captain's going to go cheer with everyone！ 
Do your bestー！ Leave the cheering here to usー！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……！ 
…………――Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
We're reaching the mid-point of the 『Scavenger Hunt, 4000m Obstacle Course』！ 
Nobody has dropped out yet, but――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
Haaa～…… Haaa～…… Deyaa～～～～！！ 
Taaaa～～～～～～！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Kuu…… Haa…… Haa……！

text_block_list.name: Cap-wearing Spectator
text_block_list.text:
Wa, that girl looks like she's worn out. 
I wonder if she'll be able to make it to the end～？

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
…… I-I will…… finish this event…… 
I…… I will――！ ……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Don't give up～～～！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone, now's the time to cheer！ During such a difficult event 
like this, that's when they need your cheering the most！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Each and every one of your cheers will reach the Uma Musume！ 
Let's make our feelings and voices in to one！ One, two.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hurray！ Hurray！！ 
Tr-a-ce-n！！

text_block_list.name: Spectator in a Chair
text_block_list.text: ……eh, hurrayー. Hurrayー？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Sounding good！ Next, let's raise our voices more and more！ 
On the count of 3, let's go with Hurray, Hurray！ 1, 2, 3！

text_block_list.name: King & Spectators
text_block_list.text:
Hurray！ Hurray！！ 
Doー・Yourー・Bestー!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wonderful！ Again, with the same rhythmn！ 
Hurray！ Hurray！

text_block_list.name: King & Spectators
text_block_list.text:
Doー・ Yourー・ Bestー！ 
Hurray！ Hurray！ Do・Your・Best！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……DoooseeeeeeeEEi～～～～！！

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess, once again runs forward！ One after another, 
her and the other Uma Musume begin climbing the hill！

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text:
Do your bestー！ Goooo, make it to the topー！ 
Don't give up until the end！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes！ More, keep calling out to them！ If you don't know the 
timing, just match up with me！ One, two！

text_block_list.name: King & Spectators
text_block_list.text: Hurray！ Hurray！ Tr-a-ce-n！！

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Everyone makes it to the top！ They've all made it！！ The last 
straight is the scavenger hunt！ Where they must run to the goal 
with an item decided by drawing lots！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
King-sa～～n！ Your stole, I need that stole！！ 
The item I need is a 『Stole』！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeeh！？ But this stole is sewn in to the jacket！ 
Aaaah～ I guess it can't be helped～！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Go take first place！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……Yes！！

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text:
Uooooooooh, runー！ 
You're almost there, everyone goーー！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Right, do your best！ Keep doing your best……！ 
Just a little more……！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
(If you're going to keep pushing forward 
then, I'll keep cheering you on)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
(After all, pushing you forward while you head 
towards your goals, when you're doing your best 
to chase your dreams, cheering you on isー)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: As a fan, there's nothing better……！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Gooooooooooooo！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: TeeEEEryaaaaaaaaaaーー！！
(Waaaaaaaaaaaaaーー……！！)
